name: Lyse Fiberinvest
goal:
Lyse is in the broadband business in Norway and Denmark. Potentially also in other markets in Europe.

Lyse has established a market leading position as FTTH infrastructure provider in Norway. Through Lyses daughter company Altibox, running a franchise partner product house, the number of customers is exceeding 400 000 connected FTTH customers as of date.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: Public consultation on the evaluation and review of the regulartory framework for electronic communications networks and services.
